Articles.Content:
So, today I made a high-speed plane that can go fast enough to burn in low the atmosphere, and when I took it on a test flight it started to show heat bars at the nose, and radiators, not the most aerodynamic piece of metal in the world and a little too wide and using a radial attachment point, well the (smallest) heat shield is a lil too big. so I was wondering if anyone out there could make a radial heat shield mod, like Space Shuttle.

Edited November 25, 2017 by Jack5.exe
You can add ablator to the parts with a simple MM patch, do it one by one, or write a simple plugin to add the ability to have ablator.
